prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of an elderly, extremely muscular man, deep tan skin tone, completely bald head, long flowing white beard, iconic red plastic sunglasses, wearing a vibrant Hawaiian shirt, intense weathered expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, professional studio lighting, extreme detailed skin wrinkles and age spots, visible pores, high contrast, detailed texture on beard hair, subtle reflections on sunglasses
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, CGI, plastic skin, smooth skin, perfect skin, doll, toy, blurry beard, thick white hair, low quality, flat lighting, cartoon sunglasses
